sentences.en: " The little baggage hath witchcraft in her, I profess,'said he to Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.cn: “ 这小姑娘准是有魔法附体, 我敢说, ” 他对丁梅斯代尔先生说.

sentences.en: All these things that you call witchcraft are capable of a natural explanation.
sentences.cn: 被你们统统叫做巫术的那些东西都可以得到合情合理的解释.

sentences.en: At that time most people believed in sorcery and witchcraft.
sentences.cn: 那时候大多数人相信巫术和魔法.

sentences.en: Did you use magic and witchcraft?
sentences.cn: 你使用了魔术和巫术 吗 ?

sentences.en: Faced with such detraction, scientists characteristically retort that science, unlike witchcraft, works.
sentences.cn: 面对诋毁, 科学家们出于天性给予反驳,宣称科学不是巫术, 确实有效.

sentences.en: Furthermore, fortune - telling and witchcraft have often led to harmful behavior.
sentences.cn: 况且, 算命 和巫术经常导致伤害的行为.

sentences.en: He's interested in witchcraft and the occult.
sentences.cn: 他对巫术魔法情有独钟。

sentences.en: I will destroy your witchcraft and you will no longer cast spells.
sentences.cn: 12又必除掉你手中的邪术.你那里也不再有占卜的.

sentences.en: In 1951, the laws against Witchcraft were repealed in England.
sentences.cn: 在1951年, 英格兰废除了反对魔法的法律.

sentences.en: In Salem, Massachusetts, in 1692, many people believed in and feared witchcraft.
sentences.cn: 年, 麻塞诸塞州的沙连, 许多人相信并且害怕邪术.

sentences.en: In Salem, Massachusetts, in 1692, many people believed in and feared witchcraft.
sentences.cn: 1692年, 麻塞诸塞州的沙连, 许多人相信并且害怕邪术.

sentences.en: New student, welcome to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!
sentences.cn: 新同学, 欢迎来到霍格沃茨魔法学校!

sentences.en: Q: Or attend a school for wizardry and witchcraft?
sentences.cn: (或是进入一所巫师和魔法学校? )

sentences.en: Seldom draw upon fiction and witchcraft direct us through economic history.
sentences.cn: 古往今来,很少有人通过小说或巫术来研究经济史.

sentences.en: The woman practising witchcraft claimed that she could conjure up the spirits of the dead.
sentences.cn: 那个女巫说她能用魔法召唤亡灵.

sentences.en: This week Sabrina uses witchcraft to overcome her fear of giving a speech.
sentences.cn: 这一周萨布丽娜用巫术来克服对发表演说的恐惧。

trans.tran_en: the use of magic powers, especially evil ones, to make things happen
